corridor.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a long narrow passage on a train or between rooms in a building, with doors leading off it
corridor.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Go down here and the bathroom’s at the end of the corridor.
We had to wait outside in the corridor until our names were called.
corridor.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a narrow area of land between cities or countries that has different qualities or features from the land around it
corridor.translation[0].definitions[1].e: the industrial corridor that connects Querétaro with Mexico City
